verses.verse: כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All הַמִּצְוָ֗ה <S%H4687><s%> All the commandments אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which אָנֹכִ֧י <S%H595><s%> I am מְצַוְּךָ֛ <S%H6680><s%> which I command הַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> thee this day תִּשְׁמְר֣וּן <S%H8104><s%> shall ye observe לַעֲשׂ֑וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to do לְמַ֨עַן <S%H4616><s%> that תִּֽחְי֜וּן <S%H2421><s%> that ye may live וּרְבִיתֶ֗ם <S%H7235><s%> and multiply וּבָאתֶם֙ <S%H935><s%> and go in וִֽירִשְׁתֶּ֣ם <S%H3423><s%> and possess אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נִשְׁבַּ֥ע <S%H7650><s%> sware יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD לַאֲבֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H1><s%> unto your fathers

וְזָכַרְתָּ֣ <S%H2142><s%> And thou shalt remember אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַדֶּ֗רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> all the way אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which הֹלִֽיכֲךָ֜ <S%H1980><s%> has led יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God זֶ֛ה <S%H2088><s%> these אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <S%H705><s%> thee these forty שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> years בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness לְמַ֨עַן <S%H4616><s%> might עַנֹּֽתְךָ֜ <S%H6031><s%> to humble לְנַסֹּֽתְךָ֗ <S%H5254><s%> thee [and] to prove לָדַ֜עַת <S%H3045><s%> thee to know אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> what בִּֽלְבָבְךָ֛ <S%H3824><s%> what [was] in thine heart הֲתִשְׁמֹ֥ר <S%H8104><s%> whether thou wouldest keep [מִצְוֹתֹו כ] (מִצְוֹתָ֖יו <S%H4687><s%> commanded ק) אִם־ <S%H518><s%> or לֹֽא׃ <S%H3808><s%> not

וַֽיְעַנְּךָ֮ <S%H6031><s%> And he humbled וַיַּרְעִבֶךָ֒ <S%H7456><s%> thee and suffered thee to hunger וַיַּֽאֲכִֽלְךָ֤ <S%H398><s%> and fed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמָּן֙ <S%H4478><s%> thee with manna אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor יָדַ֔עְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> which thou knewest וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor יָדְע֖וּן <S%H3045><s%> know אֲבֹתֶ֑יךָ <S%H1><s%> not neither did thy fathers לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> because of הוֹדִֽעֲךָ֗ <S%H3045><s%> that he might make thee know כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> by הַלֶּ֤חֶם <S%H3899><s%> by bread לְבַדּוֹ֙ <S%H905><s%> only יִחְיֶ֣ה <S%H2421><s%> doth not live הָֽאָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> that man כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> by כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> everything מוֹצָ֥א <S%H4161><s%> but by every [word] that proceedeth פִֽי־ <S%H6310><s%> out of the mouth יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD יִחְיֶ֥ה <S%H2421><s%> live הָאָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> doth man

שִׂמְלָ֨תְךָ֜ <S%H8071><s%> Thy raiment לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> nor בָֽלְתָה֙ <S%H1086><s%> waxed not old מֵֽעָלֶ֔יךָ <S%H5921><s%> and וְרַגְלְךָ֖ <S%H7272><s%> upon thee neither did thy foot לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor בָצֵ֑קָה <S%H1216><s%> swell זֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> these אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <S%H705><s%> these forty שָׁנָֽה׃ <S%H8141><s%> years

וְיָדַעְתָּ֖ <S%H3045><s%> Thou shalt also consider עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> in לְבָבֶ֑ךָ <S%H3824><s%> thine heart כִּ֗י <S%H3588><s%> for כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after יְיַסֵּ֥ר <S%H3256><s%> chasteneth אִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> that as a man אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנ֔וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> [so] the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God מְיַסְּרֶֽךָּ׃ <S%H3256><s%> chasteneth

וְשָׁ֣מַרְתָּ֔ <S%H8104><s%> Therefore thou shalt keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִצְוֹ֖ת <S%H4687><s%> the commandments יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God לָלֶ֥כֶת <S%H1980><s%> to walk בִּדְרָכָ֖יו <S%H1870><s%> in his ways וּלְיִרְאָ֥ה <S%H3372><s%> and to fear אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%>

כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> For יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> For the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God מְבִֽיאֲךָ֖ <S%H935><s%> bringeth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> land טוֹבָ֑ה <S%H2896><s%> thee into a good אֶ֚רֶץ <S%H776><s%> a land נַ֣חֲלֵי <S%H5158><s%> of brooks מָ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> of water עֲיָנֹת֙ <S%H5869><s%> of fountains וּתְהֹמֹ֔ת <S%H8415><s%> and depths יֹצְאִ֥ים <S%H3318><s%> that spring out בַּבִּקְעָ֖ה <S%H1237><s%> of valleys וּבָהָֽר׃ <S%H2022><s%> and hills

אֶ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> A land חִטָּה֙ <S%H2406><s%> of wheat וּשְׂעֹרָ֔ה <S%H8184><s%> and barley וְגֶ֥פֶן <S%H1612><s%> and vines וּתְאֵנָ֖ה <S%H8384><s%> and fig trees וְרִמּ֑וֹן <S%H7416><s%> and pomegranates אֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> a land זֵ֥ית <S%H2132><s%> olive שֶׁ֖מֶן <S%H8081><s%> of oil וּדְבָֽשׁ׃ <S%H1706><s%> and honey

אֶ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> A land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> wherein לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> without בְמִסְכֵּנֻת֙ <S%H4544><s%> scarceness תֹּֽאכַל־ <S%H398><s%> thou shalt eat בָּ֣הּ לֶ֔חֶם <S%H3899><s%> bread לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> without תֶחְסַ֥ר <S%H2637><s%> thou shalt not lack כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> anything בָּ֑הּ אֶ֚רֶץ <S%H776><s%> any [thing] in it a land אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> whose אֲבָנֶ֣יהָ <S%H68><s%> whose stones בַרְזֶ֔ל <S%H1270><s%> [are] iron וּמֵהֲרָרֶ֖יהָ <S%H2042><s%> and out of whose hills תַּחְצֹ֥ב <S%H2672><s%> thou mayest dig נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <S%H5178><s%> brass

וְאָכַלְתָּ֖ <S%H398><s%> When thou hast eaten וְשָׂבָ֑עְתָּ <S%H7646><s%> and art full וּבֵֽרַכְתָּ֙ <S%H1288><s%> then thou shalt bless אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הָאָ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> land הַטֹּבָ֖ה <S%H2896><s%> for the good אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which נָֽתַן־ <S%H5414><s%> which he hath given לָֽךְ׃

הִשָּׁ֣מֶר <S%H8104><s%> Beware לְךָ֔ פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> not תִּשְׁכַּ֖ח <S%H7911><s%> that thou forget אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> not the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God לְבִלְתִּ֨י <S%H1115><s%> not שְׁמֹ֤ר <S%H8104><s%> in not keeping מִצְוֹתָיו֙ <S%H4687><s%> his commandments וּמִשְׁפָּטָ֣יו <S%H4941><s%> and his judgments וְחֻקֹּתָ֔יו <S%H2708><s%> and his statutes אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> which אָנֹכִ֥י <S%H595><s%> I מְצַוְּךָ֖ <S%H6680><s%> which I command הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> thee this day

פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> otherwise תֹּאכַ֖ל <S%H398><s%> Lest [when] thou hast eaten וְשָׂבָ֑עְתָּ <S%H7646><s%> and art full וּבָתִּ֥ים <S%H1004><s%> houses טוֹבִ֛ים <S%H2896><s%> goodly תִּבְנֶ֖ה <S%H1129><s%> and hast built וְיָשָֽׁבְתָּ׃ <S%H3427><s%> and dwelt

וּבְקָֽרְךָ֤ <S%H1241><s%> And [when] thy herds וְצֹֽאנְךָ֙ <S%H6629><s%> and thy flocks יִרְבְּיֻ֔ן <S%H7235><s%> multiply וְכֶ֥סֶף <S%H3701><s%> and thy silver וְזָהָ֖ב <S%H2091><s%> and thy gold יִרְבֶּה־ <S%H7235><s%> is multiplied לָּ֑ךְ וְכֹ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> and all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after לְךָ֖ יִרְבֶּֽה׃ <S%H7235><s%> and all that thou hast is multiplied

וְרָ֖ם <S%H7311><s%> be lifted up לְבָבֶ֑ךָ <S%H3824><s%> Then thine heart וְשָֽׁכַחְתָּ֙ <S%H7911><s%> and thou forget אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God הַמּוֹצִיאֲךָ֛ <S%H3318><s%> which brought thee forth מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt מִבֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> from the house עֲבָדִֽים׃ <S%H5650><s%> of bondage

הַמּוֹלִ֨יכֲךָ֜ <S%H1980><s%> led בַּמִּדְבָּ֣ר ׀ <S%H4057><s%> wilderness הַגָּדֹ֣ל <S%H1419><s%> thee through that great וְהַנּוֹרָ֗א <S%H3372><s%> and terrible נָחָ֤שׁ ׀ <S%H5175><s%> serpents שָׂרָף֙ <S%H8314><s%> [wherein were] fiery וְעַקְרָ֔ב <S%H6137><s%> and scorpions וְצִמָּא֖וֹן <S%H6774><s%> and drought אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> where אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> there מָ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> where [there was] no water הַמּוֹצִ֤יא <S%H3318><s%> who brought thee forth לְךָ֙ מַ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> water מִצּ֖וּר <S%H6697><s%> out of the rock הַֽחַלָּמִֽישׁ׃ <S%H2496><s%> of flint

הַמַּֽאֲכִ֨לְךָ֥ <S%H398><s%> Who fed מָן֙ <S%H4478><s%> with manna בַּמִּדְבָּ֔ר <S%H4057><s%> thee in the wilderness אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not יָדְע֖וּן <S%H3045><s%> knew אֲבֹתֶ֑יךָ <S%H1><s%> which thy fathers לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> might עַנֹּֽתְךָ֗ <S%H6031><s%> not that he might humble וּלְמַ֙עַן֙ <S%H4616><s%> might נַסֹּתֶ֔ךָ <S%H5254><s%> thee and that he might prove לְהֵיטִֽבְךָ֖ <S%H3190><s%> thee to do thee good בְּאַחֲרִיתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H319><s%> at thy latter end

וְאָמַרְתָּ֖ <S%H559><s%> And thou say בִּלְבָבֶ֑ךָ <S%H3824><s%> in thine heart כֹּחִי֙ <S%H3581><s%> My power וְעֹ֣צֶם <S%H6108><s%> and the might יָדִ֔י <S%H3027><s%> of [mine] hand עָ֥שָׂה <S%H6213><s%> hath gotten לִ֖י אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחַ֥יִל <S%H2428><s%> me this wealth הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

וְזָֽכַרְתָּ֙ <S%H2142><s%> But thou shalt remember אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for ה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> who הַנֹּתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> for [it is] he that giveth לְךָ֛ כֹּ֖חַ <S%H3581><s%> thee power לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to get חָ֑יִל <S%H2428><s%> wealth לְמַ֨עַן <S%H4616><s%> because of הָקִ֧ים <S%H6965><s%> that he may establish אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּרִית֛וֹ <S%H1285><s%> his covenant אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נִשְׁבַּ֥ע <S%H7650><s%> which he sware לַאֲבֹתֶ֖יךָ <S%H1><s%> unto thy fathers כַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> as [it is] this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this פ

וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> shall come אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if שָׁכֹ֤חַ <S%H7911><s%> And it shall be if thou do at all תִּשְׁכַּח֙ <S%H7911><s%> forget אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God וְהָֽלַכְתָּ֗ <S%H1980><s%> and walk אַחֲרֵי֙ <S%H310><s%> after אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> gods אֲחֵרִ֔ים <S%H312><s%> other וַעֲבַדְתָּ֖ם <S%H5647><s%> and serve וְהִשְׁתַּחֲוִ֣יתָ <S%H7812><s%> them and worship לָהֶ֑ם הַעִדֹ֤תִי <S%H5749><s%> them I testify בָכֶם֙ הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> against you this day כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> that אָבֹ֖ד <S%H6><s%> that ye shall surely תֹּאבֵדֽוּן׃ <S%H6><s%> perish

כַּגּוֹיִ֗ם <S%H1471><s%> As the nations אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> that יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD מַאֲבִ֣יד <S%H6><s%> destroyeth מִפְּנֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H6440><s%> before your face כֵּ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> so תֹאבֵד֑וּן <S%H6><s%> so shall ye perish עֵ֚קֶב <S%H6118><s%> because לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not תִשְׁמְע֔וּן <S%H8085><s%> ye would not be obedient בְּק֖וֹל <S%H6963><s%> unto the voice יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> your God פ
